import React from 'react' import classes from './Users.module.css' // import UsersContainer from './UsersContainer' function Users(props) { console.log(props) let onUnfollow = () =>{ props.usersPage.users.map( u => (props.unfollow(u.id))) } return
Users{ props.usersPage.users.map(u => (

{u.followed ? : }
{u.fullname}
{u.status}
{u.location.country}
{u.location.city}
)) }
} export default Users
